notes.authentication: All endpoints require JWT Bearer token in Authorization header
notes.schoolId: Most endpoints automatically get schoolId from interceptor, but some require it in request body
notes.roles: SUPER_ADMIN and SCHOOL_ADMIN roles are required for POST, PATCH, DELETE operations
notes.pagination: Most GET endpoints support pagination with 'page' and 'limit' query parameters
notes.dateFormats: All dates should be in ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DD or YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ssZ)
notes.timeFormats: Time fields should be in HH:mm format (24-hour format)
notes.enums: Enum values are case-sensitive and should match exactly as specified
notes.uuid: All ID fields are UUIDs (Universally Unique Identifiers)
